name: Dragon and the Zodiac
description:
(Make sure you have flash enabled on your browser, or the game may not show up above!)

My first completed little flash game that I completed back in 2014. I learned a lot while making it!

Controls:

Mouse: navigate the menu
WASD: move
J: Shoot
K: Fire/detonate rocket
P: Pause

Alt Controls:

Arrow Keys: move
X: Shoot
Z: Fire/detonate rocket

http://EvanEGibbs.com
